## ITextWin32Props.textStyle property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use `style` instead.
> 

Role-based styling of the text control. The styles applied include font face, size, weight and color. These styles take precedence over the `style` property.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
textStyle?: TextStyle;
```

## Remarks

The default value is `MediumStandard`<!-- -->.

When set to `None`<!-- -->, role-based styling is disabled.
